values.description:
* We can provide Energy Performance Certificates (EPC) in the Brighton & Hove, East Sussex area and can ensure that your EPC will be carried out by us and not contracted out to anybody else. 

* All EPCs will be carried out by our fully qualified and accredited Domestic Energy Assessor who has over 19 years experience in all aspects of Property management. Information will be entered onto the Landmark Register and documents provided via email within 48 hours of the site visit (unregistered properties may take slightly longer). 

* We have extensive knowledge of the local area and can offer impartial advice, are current members of the Southern Landlords Association (SLA) and adhere to their code of practice. 

* We can undertake small building works (kitchen and bathroom refits), decorating, general maintenance, lock replacement, carpet cleaning, flat roofs and guttering. No obligation estimates provided upon request. Private and commercial.

* We also offer property for rental, carry out building maintenance and management (www.Lewis-Property.com)

* Our mission is to ensure a professional, personal and reliable service at all times.
values.name: Lewis Estates Ltd

Active Sussex
values.description: Welcome to the Linkedin company page for Active Sussex. As one of the 49 County Sports Partnerships in England, we aim to get more people taking part in sport more often. From lobbying for greater sporting investment across the region to hosting the annual Sussex Sports Awards, Active Sussex is the key partner for business and community sport in East Sussex, West Sussex and Brighton & Hove.

values.name: Aimer Media

values: Creating apps for the publishing sector

values.description:
Aimer Media is a Brighton-based app developer specialising in creating sustainable models for the publishing sector that take advantage of emerging mobile frameworks. The company works with publishers to help bring the structure and cleverness behind the printed page into innovative downloads. 

Our  apps include:

UNESCO World Heritage 
Grayson Perry: The Vanity of Small Differences
Osprey Military History Quiz
Tate Guide to Modern Art Terms
Lectionary: The Official Common Worship Calendar from the Church of England
Insight Guides Travel Photography
Insight Travel Guide app series 
Berlitz Cruise Ships 2014 
Para Fitness
My Yoga Guru & My Pilates Guru
New Daylight, Guidelines and Day by Day with God
The Daily Toss


Clients include Osprey Publishing, Collins, Insight Guides, Modern Toss and Berlitz Publishing.

It has been about 5 years since Flawless first hit the London scene and they have certainly come a long way since their first party. 

We use the word party because despite holding events at many clubs and bars, Flawless are determined to ensure that every event is a party... for the people. Yes, it is themed around a general love of all things house. Yes the resident and guest DJs can rock the crowd. Yes, they can have the crowd lingering on every build-up and breakdown. Yes, they manage to pick that luscious blend of known and new floor-fillers. Yes, they always leave the crowd screaming “ONE MORE!” 

A good night out should encapsulate the experience from start to finish and the Flawless team always work hard to deliver in every aspect, minor or major, and they do it with class and consistency.

Their brief history can boast a wide variety of amazing party nights, from their initiation at London's Rose Bar, to venues in Central London including Café De Paris, Studio Valbonne at Greenwich's 02 Dome plus branching out to the suburbs of Surrey & Kent, as well as their recently successful tour of Ibiza and a 2010 Summer long residency at Kanya Ibiza.

2011 residencies include, The White House, Pacha London, Noir Weybridge, The Funky End, The Palace, Digital Brighton, Egg London.
values.name: Flawless London

values.description:
The College of Classical Massage is a highly regarded & well-established massage college, teaching various internationally accredited and recognised Diploma training courses.  We are committed to being a centre of excellence in all aspects of massage training.   Courses are held in Brighton and Bath at weekends and on weekdays to cater for different studying needs and locations. We offer high quality tuition with specialist tutors, in a supportive group setting.

Career Opportunities -These massage courses cater for varying requirements.   Many of our students intend to work as Professional Therapists, often practising alternative therapy in addition to their current career or as a full time occupation. Others study for the pleasure of learning about the body and its healing systems and the opportunity to work on their family and friends.

For beginners: we run ITEC Diploma courses in Holistic Massage; Anatomy and Physiology; Professional conduct and Business Awareness.  For fully qualified practitioners, we offer ITEC Diplomas in Sports Massage, Certificates in Pregnancy Massage, On-Site Massage and a Certificate in Myofascial Techniques: Introductory and Advanced.  We also run Introductory courses in Body Massage and Indian Head Massage, Acupressure for Childbirth and workshops in Creating a Successful and Thriving Practice.
values.name: College of Classical Massage

values.description:
Eco Camp UK offer ecological woodland camping, set in two beautiful Sussex campsites allowing open campfires.

Wild Boar Wood Campsite and Beech Estate Woodland Campsite are set within bluebell woods in West and East Sussex. Both campsites are in designated Areas of Outstanding Natural Beauty (AONBs) and are within easy reach of London, Brighton, Hastings and the South Coast.

Beech Estate Woodland Campsite and Wild Boar Wood Campsite offer 'off-grid' forest camping through our Bell Tent ‘glamping’ experiences, with Beech Estate also offering Forest Tent Pitches. Perfect for team building holidays and activities for the corporate sector.
values.name: EcoCampUk

values.description:
Max Serviced Apartments specialise in luxury, solely managed furnished apartments in 11 prime City Centre locations. Apartments can be booked for long or short term stays... We have apartments in London, Manchester, Glasgow, Brighton, Cardiff, Norwich and Farnborough.

Max is a fast growing independent serviced apartment provider that can offer you an environment that is as close to home as it can be with the flexibility to stay from 1 night to 1 year…

Max apartments have a wide range of apartments available to you...  

We offer studio, 1, 2 or 3 bedroom apartments.

Call our enquiries and reservations team on: 0844 55 75 130 or visit us at www.max-servicedapartments.co.uk

values: Long Stay Apartments with On-site Parking

values.name: MAX Serviced Apartments

values.description:
The Martlets Hospice cares for people affected by advanced terminal illness living in and around Brighton & Hove.  
Patients can stay on our 18 bed InPatient Unit, visit our Day Hospice or be cared for at home by our  Martlets at Home team.  Practical and emotional support is also offered to the families and carers of our patients including helping them through bereavement. 
We believe that a good and dignified death is everyone’s entitlement. Our main aim is to maximise the quality of life for our patients and we strive to support patient choice, dignity and independence in all we do. We are a registered charity and all our services are provided free of charge. We must raise over £9,000 a day to care for our patients and their families, local community support is essential to our survival.
values.name: The Martlets Hospice

values.description:
Exercise With Your Baby or Toddler

Bay City Strollers is Australia's most innovative post natal exercise program for new mums. Click below to see the mums in action.


Exercise with your children in an invigorating environment under professional guidance, and restore your body and mind after the rigors of childbirth.

 Catering to different levels in the post natal exercise cycle, this proven training system will have you back in pre-pregnancy shape, or better!

Register online now to try a session for free

Groups exercising at Geelong, Melbourne, Elwood, Williamstown, Carlton, Clifton Hill, Hawthorn, South Yarra, Brighton, Parkdale, Murrumbeena, Box Hill
values.name: Bay City Strollers

values.description:
Two-man tag team making lovely little games for Android, Playbook and whatever else we can get our hands on. Our games can be played from 6 years up on a variety of platforms and are made with the utmost care and love. Our directors, Tim Frost and Owen Bennett have about 1000 years interactive and children's media experience between them*

Our current platforms are Android, Playbook and the web. We will soon be publishing to Windows Phone 7 and iOS. We're based in and around Brighton UK, so check us out and get in touch > http://pieandmash.me

* = maybe not 1000 years, but a lot of years. Say 35.

:-)
values.name: Pie + Mash

values.description:
Welcome to My Stronger Self – where “A Stronger body starts with a stronger mind!” This is the absolute core of our training philosophy. We must be strong from the inside out to truly thrive in life no matter what we’re trying to accomplish.

Founder and long time Brighton, Michigan resident, Lori Murphy, has spent more almost 20 years realizing this philosophy with My Stronger Self. A completely different approach to the standard “gym training system”, Lori’s approach is challenging for everyone regardless of your experience level or goals. While weight loss is a common goal, lifetime results are the most significant and what Lori stresses to each of her clients. Lifetime results that not only translate into lost pounds and inches but also more energy, confidence, better stress management, and a healthier relationship with food. The type of results that can never be weighed on scale or measured, but are just as important to a lifetime of personal health and wellbeing.

If you’re a person who has exercised for years or just getting started but not seeing the results you have always wanted and need we are here to help. We offer programs customized just for you, in our studio or the convenience of your own home.

We offer :

•Private In Studio Training
•Private In Home Training
•Group Training
•Cardio Classes: Zumba, Step, Kickboxing, & Cardio Mixer
•Nutritional Tracking
•And Much More …

We welcome the opportunity to help you achieve your goals.

values: Fit For Life Weight Loss Program

values.name: My Stronger Self Fitness Studio & Gym

values.description:
The Welch Corp. is a family owned, fourth generation construction company located in Brighton, Massachusetts. We specialize in excavation, grading, sitework, utilities, soil remediation, landfill construction, paving and equipment rental. We have been in business over sixty-five years and have worked on large commercial projects throughout New England and upstate New York.

The Welch Corp. has a full time estimating department that is able to quickly provide our clients with budgets and estimates. Our project superintendents and foremen are fully trained in HAZMAT and OSHA 40 Hours Training. We are a union shop having agreements with the Massachusetts Laborers and the Operating Engineers Local 4. We presently employ over one hundred and fifty skilled laborers, equipment operators and foremen.

The Welch Corp. is a member of the Building Trades Employer Association (BTEA) and The Massachusetts Building Congress. Also, we are affiliated with the Albert J. Welch Equipment Corp., which owns and operates in excess of ninety-five pieces of late model heavy equipment and support vehicles. We employ a full-time maintenance staff to ensure all our equipment is operating safely and efficiently.
values.name: The Welch Corp

values.description:
The Aldridge Foundation is an educational charity founded by Sir Rod Aldridge OBE in 2006 to help young people to reach their potential and improve their communities, principally through the sponsorship of entrepreneurial academy schools and colleges.

The Foundation sponsors Academies at Darwen in Lancashire, which opened in 2008, Brighton (2010) and Portslade (2011) in Sussex and on Portland in Dorset (2012), with Darwen Aldridge Enterprise Studio School opening in 2013 and Kensington Aldridge Academy in London opening in 2014. The Foundation is also a lead partner in the recently announced University Technical College for MediaCity in Salford.
 
The Foundation aims to harness entrepreneurship as a catalyst for social change. We are unafraid to challenge conventional thinking, and a culture of low expectations. We believe there are no limits to what people can achieve.
The entrepreneurial attributes of passion, creativity, teamwork, risk-taking, determination and problem solving are embedded into the heart of our work in the classroom and out in the community.
values.name: The Aldridge Foundation

values.description: Dream Scapes Complete Landscaping Solutions provides all aspects garden design, construction and maintenance. From simply mowing lawns to commercial project, no job is too small or too large. We cover all of the north east of England and we have offices opening shortly in Brighton and Wales.
values.name: Dream Scapes Landscaping Solutions

values.description:
The Brighton and Hove Child Contact Centre is a non-profit organisation based in the heart of the city. We provides a safe, friendly and neutral place where children of separated families can spend time with one or both parents and sometimes other family members.
The centre is fully accredited by the National Association of Child Contact Centre.
values.name: BHCCC

values.description:
Pro Motion is a broadcast equipment hire company that delivers an unrivalled service by listening to its clients' needs, offering the best technical advice, and investing in the latest equipment including high definition, solid state and other tapeless technology.

Founded in 2005, Pro Motion's core business is the dry hire of broadcast equipment from acquisition to post production. The company supports a wide variety of customers internationally, including independent production companies, lighting camera operators, audio visual production companies, post production facilities and broadcasters.

Pro Motion's equipment is primarily used for factual programming, documentaries, corporate work, sports broadcasting and multimedia, while its Cine Motion division handles mainly digital film and promo work.

Headquartered in London's Waterloo, Pro Motion also has a regional office in Brighton and a Soho-based facility which houses Pro Motion's latest acquisitions: broadcast hire facility Rent, and Eurocrew Worldwide which provides English speaking crews locally around the world.

Pro Motion is proud to operate in partnership with its customers in order to provide a seamless and stress-free service that complements the creative process. In parallel with the continual developments in new technologies Pro Motion offer training programmes, workshops and demonstrations to give clients the confidence to use new equipment that will further enhance their productions.
values.name: Pro Motion Hire Ltd

values.description:
Based in Brighton, Metway Electrical is a leading provider of electrical and PCB connectors. The company also offers a range of pre-fabricated wiring systems and lighting control. 

Metway Electrical has been providing connection solutions to the industry for over 70 years. Our product range extends to more than 20,000 products.
values.name: Metway Electrical Ind. Ltd.

values.description:
Some are born management consultants.
Some have management consultancy thrust upon them.

James Wilby (Maurice, Gosford Park, Regeneration) and Pip Donaghy (An Inspector Calls, Blasted) head the cast for this disturbingly funny re-appraisal of business life.
	
Olivier-Award winning Theatre503 continues its commitment to new writers with the world premiere of Neil Fleming’s Faustian tale for the age of austerity.


Over the past four years Hydrocracker has developed a national reputation for ‘site specific theatre with a purpose’. The company’s most recent shows have been staged on Brighton Pier, in a pizza restaurant and in an old town hall. The Consultant is the company’s first production in its new writing strand. 
Theatre503 is at 503 Battersea Park Rd, London SW11
Train to Clapham Junction, or bus routes 44, 49, 319, 344, 345
Tuesday-Saturday 7.45pm
Tickets £14, concessions £9
Sunday 5pm “Pay what you can”
values.name: The Consultant - Hydocracker/Theatre503
